.
[ ] unchecked
.
<p><input type="checkbox" id="checkbox0"><label for="checkbox0">unchecked</label></p>
.

.
[_] unchecked
.
<p><input type="checkbox" id="checkbox1"><label for="checkbox1">unchecked</label></p>
.

.
[x] checked
.
<p><input type="checkbox" id="checkbox2" checked="true"><label for="checkbox2">checked</label></p>
.

.
[X] checked
.
<p><input type="checkbox" id="checkbox3" checked="true"><label for="checkbox3">checked</label></p>
.

.
- [ ] unchecked
- [X] checked
.
<ul>
<li><input type="checkbox" id="checkbox4"><label for="checkbox4">unchecked</label></li>
<li><input type="checkbox" id="checkbox5" checked="true"><label for="checkbox5">checked</label></li>
</ul>
.

.
- [X] checked _with_ [link](http://example.com)
.
<ul>
<li><input type="checkbox" id="checkbox6" checked="true"><label for="checkbox6">checked <em>with</em> <a href="http://example.com">link</a></label></li>
</ul>
.
